documents.document: RT @BePositiveQ: Be brave. Be brave. Don't waste your life on nonsense.
Change isn't always easy. It's how you deal with the change that counts. -Reality of Life (2002)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I kicked all negativity out of my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
There's no man, alive or dead, who's going to fault you for living. -P.S I Love You (2007)
RT @LoveLifeQuote__: Be positively ambitious. Stay focused on your goals. Open your eyes, your life is full of positives.
You don't run, not when you're with us... You stand your ground and fight! -Green Street Hooligans (2005)
I am the master of my fate, I am the captain of my soul. -Invictus (2009)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I banished all negativity from my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
We're living in a material world and I am a material girl... or boy. -The Wedding Singer (1998)
RT @PositivesQuote: Focus on the positives in your life. Stay focused on what truly matters. You deserve everything that you're willing to …
The wonderful thing about falling in love is you learn everything about that person and so quickly. -Playing by Heart (1998)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I removed the cancer of negativity from my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Feelings are like treasures, so bury them. -Girls Will Be Girls (2003)
RT @Quotes4ftheSoul: Stay determined. Stay determined. Make every moment mean something.
You're not supposed to look back, you're supposed to keep going. -The Lovely Bones (2009)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I surgically removed the cancer of negativity out of my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZ9I0v
RT @PositivesQuote: Fight for your dreams. Chase your dreams with gusto. Don't let anyone disappoint you.
It must be difficult to let go of something so beautiful. -Pretty Woman (1990)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I got rid of all forms of negativity in my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Success is no fun unless you share it with someone. -Woman of the Year (1942)
RT @Motivated_Self: Chase your ambitions. Stay focused on the positive. Believe in your vision.
I've been doing a lot of thinking, and the thing is, I love you. -When Harry Met Sally... (1989)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I ejected negativity out of my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Sometimes, there are things no one can fix. -Star Wars: Attack of the Clones (2002)
RT @Quotes4ftheSoul: Motivate yourself. Avoid negative feelings. Be original.
Life is like the surf, so give yourself away like the sea. -Y tu mam� tambi�n (2001)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I rejected negativity and took back total control of my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
I don't mind called a liar when I'm lying, about to lie or just finished lying, but NOT WHEN I'M TELLING THE TRUTH. -The Simpsons (TV)
RT @TrulyInspiratio: Never shy away from adversity. Life is beautiful. Avoid the negative.
Think of what you can do by living, that you cannot do by dying... -Gandhi (1982)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I showed negativity the boot and took control of my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Success. It's got enemies. You can be successful and have enemies or you can be unsuccessful and have friends. -American Gangster (2007)
RT @BePositiveQ: Always push yourself to achieve more. Keep your eyes on the prize. Believe in your ability to achieve.
Love's cruel, Love's a flirt. Love has places to go and people to hurt. -'Til There Was You (1997)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I kicked negativity out of my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Life is like a film. It always has a happy ending. If there's no happy ending it means the film is not done yet. -Om Shanti Om (2007)
RT @LoveLifeQuote__: Believe in your life and your future. Believe in your dreams. Love your life with all your soul.
Fear is our greatest enemy, and hope is our greatest weapon against the disease. -Restoration (1995)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I pushed negativity right out of my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
In my opinion, when relationship gets too serious, it's over. -Conversation with Other Women (2005)
That's the thing with girls. They grew up and break your heart. -Snow Falling on Cedars (1999)
RT @AmbitiousQuotz: Life is good. Believe in your abilities. Every day is a new opportunity.
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I rejected negativity and all of its ugly cousins: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Sitting between in the past and your future doesn't mean you are in the present. -Dakota Skye (2008)
RT @Quotes4ftheSoul: Avoid negative energy. Always keep trying. Focus on achieving your goals.
Let me tell you something about women. They want you to come get them, they LOVE it. -Wayne's World (1992)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I embraced a positive attitude towards life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Love is a many splendored thing. Love lifts us up where we belong. All you need is love! -Moulin Rouge! (2001)
RT @BePositiveQ: Love every part of yourself. Focus on your dreams and ambitions. Make every day count.
Love is all a matter of timing. -2046 (2004)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I stopped letting negativity control my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
My heart is, and always will be, yours. -Sense and Sensibility (1995)
RT @PositivesQuote: Work for your ambitions. Always push yourself to achieve more. Work for your ambitions.
Sometimes I think it would be nice to have someone, with whom to share this life. -Paris, je t'aime (2006)
Gandhi said that whatever you do in life will be insignificant. But it's very important that you do it. -Remember Me (2010)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I banished all forms of negativity from my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
I don't know why men lie; they just do. -Body of Evidence (1993)
RT @Motivated_Self: Focus on your own ambitions. Avoid the negative. Always go the extra mile.
Live for nothing or die for something! -Rambo (2008)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I finally won my battle against negativity: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Life is a series of arrivals and departures. -View from the Toop (2003)
RT @LoveLifeQuote__: Tomorrow will be another adventure. Never let anything get you down. Focus on your own dreams.
Just because you can't see something, doesn't mean is doesn't exist. -The Santa Clause (1994)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I fought back against negativity and won: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Two people can be perfect for each other. But if the timing's wrong, it�s never going to work out. -Love & Sex (2000)
RT @Motivated_Self: Never shy away from adversity. Life is beautiful. Keep the fire in your heart alive.
Love may not make the world go round, but it makes the ride worth while. -On the Line (2001)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I finally managed to abolish negativity from my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Love is a wish you hide in your heart that no one else knows. -Bandits (2001)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I finally managed to kick negativity out of my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Forget about what you thought you were and just accept who you are. -Jersey Girl (2004)
RT @Quotes4ftheSoul: Keep the fire in your heart alive. Make every day matter. Believe in yourself.
Luck is when preparation meets opportunity. -Little Black Book (2004)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I said no to negativity and all of its nastiness: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Life is not the amount of breaths you take, it's the moments that take your breath away. -Hitch (2005)
It's never too late to become what you might have been. -Away from Her (2006)
RT @LoveLifeQuote__: Be excited about your future. Aspire to create. Turn your ambitions into real action.
You want a life? Get one. Grant yourself a wish to change. then stop complaining. Do something. -Lying to be Perfect (2010)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I rejected negativity from my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Well, maybe it's time for you to grow up, take charge of your life, and be all that you can be. -Lying to be Perfect (2010)
RT @AmbitiousQuotz: Work for your ambitions. Work for your ambitions. Believe in positivity.
We are all Cinderella. No matter what our size, within each one of us, there's unique beauty and grace. -Lying to be Perfect (2001)
RT @Motivated_Self: Stay focused on the things that matter to you. Turn your dreams into a reality. Achieve your goals.
Happy endings are just stories that haven't finished yet. -Mr. & Mrs. Smith (2005)
You've got only one life to live. You can either make it chickenshit or chicken salad. -Cousins (1989)
Maybe if you didn't put yourself down so much, you wouldn't be so pathetic. -Lying to be Perfect (2010)
RT @BePositiveQ: Adopt positive habits. Love life. Work hard for your dreams.
I'm sick and tired of being treated like I don't exist. -American Beauty (1999)
Death cannot stop true love. All it can do is delay it for a while. -The Princess Bride (1987)
RT @PositivesQuote: Don't let anyone disappoint you. Stay focused on your own life. Turn your dreams into a reality.
That's life. You never know where it's gonna take you from one moment to the next. It's full of surprises. -For The Moment (1993)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I became spectacularly happy by learning to kick negativity out of my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
Let me tell you about love. You don't ask, you give. -Things You Can Tell Just by Looking at Her (1999)
RT @Quotes4ftheSoul: Believe in your life. Stay focused on what truly matters. Stay emotionally positive.
The truth is, you come into this world alone and leave it the exact same way. -Little Manhattan (2005)
RT @LiveBetterFeelB: How I became very happy by saying no to negativity in my life: http://t.co/J5yxZZrjp5
I'd rather be a friendless loser, than have a bunch of friends who secretly hate me. -The Clique (2008)
RT @TrulyInspiratio: Life is a success-seeking adventure. Focus on your own life. Focus on your dreams.
"Ariadne: ""Why is it so important to dream?"" Cobb: ""Because, in my dreams we are together."" -Inception (2010)"
Because time will pass and everything will be fine -My Sassy Girl (2008)
